sources.title: The Foolish Bunny (1938)
sources.description: Told in flashback, th story explains why one of the bunnies in the classroom is  so much bigger and older than his classmates. He devoted his early years to  disrupting the class rather than studying and learning his lessons, with the  result that he remained behind while the other students were promoted. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/the-foolish-bunny-1938/

metadata.Plot: Told in flashback, th story explains why one of the bunnies in the classroom is so much bigger and older than his classmates. He devoted his early years to disrupting the class rather than studying and learning his lessons, with the result that he remained behind while the other students were promoted.
metadata.Actors: Celeste Rush, Danny Webb, Robert Winkler
